scenes.text: Judges deny parole more often in the afternoon than in the morning.
scenes.prompt: Split scene. Left side: a cartoon judge with white curly wig, black robe with white collar at a bench in morning sunlight stamping 'APPROVED' on papers. Right side: the same cartoon judge with white curly wig, black robe with white collar in afternoon shadows stamping 'DENIED' on papers. A clock shows the time difference. Simple cartoon style with clean white lines on black background.
